products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Yellow - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Roller 4073 Bright Yellow - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated 1271 Sunny Yellow - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1271 sunny yellow - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Flying Pleated 1263 Metallic Gold - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1263 metallic gold - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Venetian 7056 Spingled Gold - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows. Water and stain resistant - well suited for bathrooms and kitchens. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Venetian, 7056 spingled gold - velux loft blind control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows.
